tool_description: Analyzes funder's previous awards and funding patterns to identify successful project characteristics, competitive landscape insights, and strategic positioning opportunities for proposals.

funder_name.description: Name of the funding organization to analyze

analysis_years.description: Number of years of historical data to analyze

focus_areas.description: Specific topic areas to focus competitive analysis

include_unsuccessful.description: Whether to include analysis of unsuccessful applications if available

award_size_range.description: Filter by award size range: small, medium, large, or all

error_messages: Funder not found: Cannot locate historical funding data for the specified funder and program combination.
Insufficient historical data: Less than 5 awards found for meaningful competitive analysis.
Invalid analysis period: analysis_years must be between 1 and 10.
Invalid award size range: award_size_range must be one of [small, medium, large, all].
Data access error: Unable to access funding database or historical records.
usage: Provide funder_name and program_name for basic analysis. Customize with analysis_years, focus_areas, include_unsuccessful, award_size_range, and geographic_filter for targeted insights.

total_awards_analyzed.description: Number of awards included in the analysis

funding_trends.description: Trends in funding priorities and amounts

average_award_amount.description: Average award amount in the analyzed period

success_rate.description: Overall success rate percentage if data available
